overview: These young girls thought they already knew everything in matters of pleasure. They are soon to discover they still have a lot to learn. For his 40th anniversary, Marc Dorcel has decided to offer you some of the most arousing initiation scenes filmed in the course of these past 40 years. 3h25, 12 scenes and 17 actresses, here’s the chance you were dreaming of to discover or rediscover the history of the inventor of French Pornochic.
title: 40th Anniversary : Initiation
